CLUE: The Roman emperor said to have made his horse a consul
FOUND IN: Caligula (Latin for "little boots") - The nickname given by Roman citizens due to his perceived eccentric behavior, but he is not directly linked with making his horse a consul.

CLUE: Small African nocturnal primate with large eyes
FOUND IN: Bushbaby (Acinonyx jubatus) - Although not strictly a small African nocturnal primate, bushbabies are closely related and share similar features.

CLUE: Step up the ladder - called for
FOUND IN: Rung (singular form referring to the individual steps on a ladder)

CLUE: Scottish residence of the British royal family
Fabric made from silky hair of angora goat
FOUND IN: Mohair: An exceptionally soft fiber obtained from the Angora goat that is often woven into luxurious fabrics and textiles.

Ensemble (referring to the whole group performing)
